meanings.sent1: The unbuffered computer struggled to handle multiple tasks at once.
meanings.sent2: The unbuffered video stream kept freezing due to the lack of a buffer.
meanings.sent3: The unbuffered phone call made it hard to hear the other person clearly.
meanings.sent4: Her unbuffered emotions spilled out uncontrollably during the argument.
meanings.sent5: The unbuffered road trip was filled with unexpected stops and delays.

meanings.sent1: The unbuffered data transfer caused the file to load slowly.
meanings.sent2: The unbuffered internet connection led to constant interruptions during the video call.
meanings.sent3: His unbuffered reaction to the news was surprising to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The unbuffered river flowed swiftly after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The unbuffered sound system produced crackling noises during the concert.
